about_the_game:
Purrfect Galaxies is an entertaining catventure and a straightforward resource management game in the style of the classic Hamurabi. Take control of the planet Cataris and sustain your growing, demanding meowpurrlation through ten challenging solar cycles. Will you triumphantly curl back into your cozy spot, or will the devouring hunger bring your reign to an end?

■ Recommended for:
⇒ Who appreciate text-based strategy games and simple resource management
⇒ Who enjoy short games with evolving stories
⇒ Who love cats and science fiction :3

■ Additional information to avoid becoming "Not for me":
If you’re looking for an extended gameplay experience, this might not be the right game for you. It offers a concise journey with its share of ups and downs ... ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

■ Game Controls and Technical Specifications:
Purrfect Galaxies is easy to play with a mouse and keyboard and runs smoothly on lower-end computers. The game was programmed with Kivy in Python and uses AI-generated art for its visual elements.

short_description: Purrfect Galaxies is a text-based strategy game. As the ruler of the planet Cataris, hungry cats await your decisions. Will you let your meowpurrlation bask in catnip bliss, or will they unsheathe their claws and seal your doom?
